SELECT id , nickname , reg_date , type , mac FROM device WHERE user_id = #{id} ORDER BY ${order};

SELECT d.id , s.sw_name , d.nickname , d.reg_date , d.type , d.mac FROM device d, software s WHERE d.user_id = #{id} AND s.id = d.sw_id AND sw_id = (SELECT id FROM software WHERE sw_name = #{sw}) ORDER BY ${order};

SELECT s.sw_name , l.start_date , l.end_date , l.state , c.corp_name , l.sw_id FROM license l, device d, corp c, software s WHERE d.nickname = (SELECT nickname FROM device WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND id = #{deviceId}) AND d.user_id = l.user_id AND l.sw_id = s.id AND d.sw_id = s.id AND s.corp_id = c.id;
